meanings.definition: A company that operates one or more pubs.
meanings.sent1: The local pubco owns several pubs in town.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy visiting the pubco near my house for a drink.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pubco go to the bar? To check on their investments!
meanings.sent4: The pubco is like a shepherd, guiding its pubs to success.
meanings.sent5: The pubco is the heart of the community, bringing people together for good times.

meanings.definition: The abbreviation for a public company.
meanings.sent1: The stock market is buzzing with news about the latest pubco.
meanings.sent2: Investors are eager to learn more about the new pubco on the market.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pubco wear a suit? Because it wanted to impress the shareholders!
meanings.sent4: The pubco stands tall in the financial landscape, a beacon of transparency.
meanings.sent5: The pubco symbolizes trust and openness in the business world.
